attributes.name: RequestStateService
attributes.description:
The RequestStateService is used to track the state of requests
for fetching or updating known resource identifies that are inflight.

methods.name: subscribeForRecord

methods.description: Retrieve all active requests for a given resource identity.
methods.name: getPendingRequestsForRecord

return.description: an array of request states for any pending requests for the given identifier

methods.description: Retrieve the last completed request for a given resource identity.
methods.name: getLastRequestForRecord

return.description: the state of the most recent request for the given identifier
